metadata.title: CVE-2024-3935 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In Eclipse Mosquito, versions from 2.0.0 through 2.0.18, if a Mosquittobroker is configured to create an outgoing bridge connection, and thatbridge connection has an incoming topic configured that makes use of topicremapping, then if the remote connection sends a crafted PUBLISH packet tothe broker a double free will occur with a subsequent crash of the broker.

criterions.comment: mosquitto package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
